author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1464514 from branch-1 to branch-1.2 to fix MAPREDUCE-4463. Fix job recovery failures which were caused by HDFS permission issues since the token file was being read as the user who submitted the job rather than JobTracker user. Contributed by Tom White & Arun C Murthy.

author: jukka
msg: OAK-709: Consider moving permission evaluation to the node state level
Make NodeState.getChildNode() @Nonnull by adding a NodeState.exists() method

author: fmartelli
msg: fix taskexec registration in case of SUMMARY TraceLevel

author: acmurthy
msg: MAPREDUCE-4463. Fix job recovery failures which were caused by HDFS permission issues since the token file was being read as the user who submitted the job rather than JobTracker user. Contributed by Tom White & Arun C Murthy.
